org.osmdroid.views.overlay.infowindow

Class MarkerInfoWindow

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.osmdroid.views.overlay.infowindow.InfoWindow
      • org.osmdroid.views.overlay.infowindow.BasicInfoWindow
        • org.osmdroid.views.overlay.infowindow.MarkerInfoWindow

  • public class MarkerInfoWindow
extends BasicInfoWindow
    MarkerInfoWindow is the default implementation of InfoWindow for a Marker. It handles R.id.bubble_title = OverlayWithIW.getTitle(), R.id.bubble_subdescription = OverlayWithIW.getSubDescription(), R.id.bubble_description = OverlayWithIW.getSnippet(), R.id.bubble_image = Marker.getImage() Description and sub-description interpret HTML tags (in the limits of the Html.fromHtml(String) API). Clicking on the bubble will close it.
